# [Figma](https://www.figma.com)

Figma Provider

## Implementation Details

- Provider
Name: Figma
- Documentation: NONE
- HTTPS support: YES
- Fake Response: NO
- Oembed Params: maxwidth , maxheight
- Supported Hosts: figma.com
- Responsive response: NO
- Collections: DefaultProviderCollection , SlimProviderCollection
